title: PhotoSuite 4 Pro v4.3.688 Android.apk
description:
PhotoSuite is a photo studio app with wide-ranging capabilities. From Photoshop essentials such as picture editing fun effects, combining of pictures, picture collages and sketching pictures to advanced photo art tools such as working with layers and masks as well as complex selection of objects Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PhotoSuite allows you to create astonishing images. Share results with your friends and family in social networks, your cloud storage or via email.

Features:
Improve your photos - crop photos, apply fine tone and color changes to get the best of your photos.
Use advanced photo designer tools Ã¢â‚¬â€œ work with layers to combine pictures and create work-of- art collages.
Enhance your images with graphical text and free drawing.
Work with picture filters and effects - Invert , Grayscale, Pointillize, Crystallize, Exposure, Posterize, Diffuse, Contrast, Displace, Kaleidoscope, Marble, Ripple, Block, Weave, Oil, Reduce noise, Sharpen, Edge.
File formats Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PhotoSuite works in its own native format but can open and export images to the commonly used PNG, JPEG and gs formats.
Use comprehensive selection tools and grouping of objects to quickly and easily handle parts of your image.
Take advantage of your device camera to capture photos and include them in your image projects.
Share images Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PhotoSuite allows you to share images with your family and friends Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in social networks such asGoogle +, Picassa or Twitter; in your cloud accounts like Dropbox (via their third party applications); as email attachments.

What's in this version :
Heal tool (available only for pro version)
Clone tool (available only for pro version)
Splash tools (available only for pro version)
Flood fill tool
Text and shape gradients
Text and shape shadows
Required Android O/S : 2.2+
